Container.Name: wh-web-check
Container.Overview: All-in-one OSINT tool for analysing any website.
Container.Category: Security: Tools: Other: Network:Web Network:Management Network:Privacy Network:Other

Config.Name: Web-Check web UI port
Config.Description: The TCP port Web-Check listens on.

Config.Name: API_CORS_ORIGIN
Config.Description: Enable CORS, by setting your allowed hostname(s).

Config.Name: BUILT_WITH_API_KEY
Config.Description: A BuiltWith API key. This will show the main features of a site.

Config.Name: CLOUDMERSIVE_API_KEY
Config.Description: API key for Cloudmersive. This will show known threats associated with the IP.

Config.Name: GOOGLE_CLOUD_API_KEY
Config.Description: A Google API key. This can be used to return quality metrics for a site.

Config.Name: REACT_APP_SHODAN_API_KEY
Config.Description: A Shodan API key. This will show associated host names for a given domain.

Config.Name: REACT_APP_WHO_API_KEY
Config.Description: A WhoAPI key. This will show more comprehensive WhoIs records than the default job.

Config.Name: SECURITY_TRAILS_API_KEY
Config.Description: A Security Trails API key. This will show org info associated with the IP.

Config.Name: TORRENT_IP_API_KEY
Config.Description: A torrent API key. This will show torrents downloaded by an IP.

Config.Name: TRANCO_USERNAME
Config.Description: A Tranco email. This will show the rank of a site, based on traffic.

Config.Name: TRANCO_API_KEY
Config.Description: A Tranco API key. This will show the rank of a site, based on traffic.
